header.gameNote: HALL OF FAME SHOWCASE AT SPRINGFIELD MA

article.headline: Fairfield 59, Old Dominion 51
article.story: SPRINGFIELD, Mass. -- Derek Needham scored 19 points to lead Fairfield to a 59-51 victory over Old Dominion on Friday night at the Hall of Fame Holiday Showcase. Rakim Sanders added 15 rebounds and nine points for the Stags (6-4), who led 26-9 with 4:11 remaining in the first half. Kent Bazemore and Dimitri Batten led a late first-half surge by the Monarchs (5-4) that got them back to within 29-23 at halftime. But Fairfield opened the second half with an 11-2 run to build a 40-25 lead with 16:26 remaining. The Monarchs, who came in shooting 39 percent on the season, made just 29.8 percent (17 of 57) against the Stags. Old Dominion trailed 46-27 with 12 minutes remaining, but Fairfield went scoreless for the next 6:22, allowing the Monarchs to trim their deficit. Chris Cooper and Nick Wright scored 10 points apiece for Old Dominion.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
